settings.promo_text: Description of promotion with lots of details.

settings.text: Less Effort, More Easy: Cooking any meal can be time-consuming, but holiday meals can be even more intense. Our job at Table & Twine is to make your job as easy and effortless as possible. In fact, all of our planning, shopping, prepping, chopping, slicing, and dicing adds up to somewhere in the neighborhood of 90 percent of the work involved with hosting your Christmas dinner. Our innovative packaging even means faster and easier cleanups!

Fresh and Flavorful Ingredients: No bland, plastic wrapped ingredients here. Our chefs are meticulous about sourcing only the best and freshest ingredients, which they package themselves by hand. While other meal kits may sacrifice quality for convenience, Table & Twine is relentlessly committed to ensuring both.

A Relaxing Holiday Meal: For many holiday hosts, the words “relaxing” and “holiday” seem mutually exclusive. With Table & Twine, a more relaxing holiday meal is exactly what you get. The best part? You get to share it with the people you love instead of spending that time in the kitchen.

settings.heading: {{ collection.metafields.custom.second_heading.value }}
settings.heading2: Why Choose a Chef-Prepared Christmas Meal Kit?
settings.text2: Whether you’re a seasoned Christmas host or you’re taking on hosting duties for the first time this year, we all can use a helping hand. When you partner with Table & Twine for your holiday meal, here are just a few of the benefits you’ll enjoy:

settings.title: How much time will I need to prepare the food within my Christmas food kit?
settings.text: Think you need hours upon hours to put a delicious homemade meal on the kitchen table? Think again. We recommend setting aside about two hours to complete the final steps of your Table & Twine Christmas meal kit.

settings.title: How far in advance do I need to order my Christmas meal kit?
settings.text: The holidays will be here before you know it! While we recommend ordering your Table & Twine Christmas meal kit as soon as possible, you have until December 18th to place your order.

settings.title: Can I customize my Christmas meal kit?
settings.text: Table & Twine meal kits cannot be customized. However, our meals are crowd-pleasers among both adults and children.

settings.heading: Heating Instructions
settings.text: Preparing an allergy-friendly meal by Table & Twine is simple! Just scan the QR code on your meal’s packaging for easy-to-follow heating instructions. These instructions are also available online.
